title: Student Health and Wellness Services
description: Student Health and Wellness Services is an ambulatory care facility for students, funded by a mandatory health fee.
cleaned_text: Student Health and Wellness Services WELCOME TO HEALTH SERVICES Cal Poly Pomona Student Health Services is open during regular business hours (Monday-Friday, 8 am to 5 pm). Students should call 909-869-4000 to make an appointment. If refills are needed for medications, please call 909-869-4000 and health staff will assist with processing refills.
